title: Sermon on the Mount: Salt and Light
description:
Readings from:

Matthew 5:11-16

Ephesians 5:8-10

Today's passages were read by Larry Eldridge, executive minister at Westgate Church of Christ in Dothan, Ala., and the creator of the podcast 60-Second Sermon.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
